Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can include and label at least three different living things (plants and/or animals) in the land habitat.
The student can include and label at least three different living things (plants and/or animals) in the water habitat.
The student can show and describe the differences in living things found in the land and water habitats.
The student can illustrate patterns, such as common types of plants in both habitats or unique animals to each habitat.
